typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SNo as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		PSG_Key as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string,
		current_flag as integer,
		inserted_date as date,
		Lastupdate_date as date,
		PHASHkey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(SCDHash = md5(iif(isNull(Name),'',toString(Name))
+ iif(isNull(ProductNumber),'',toString(ProductNumber))
+ iif(isNull(unitprice),'',toString(unitprice))
+ iif(isNull(Color),'',toString(Color))
)) ~> Hash
Hash, source2 exists(SCDHash == PHASHkey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, source2 lookup(source1@ProductID == source2@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
ConditionalSplit1@NewRow alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Lookup1 split(isnull(current_flag),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, )
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PSG_Key as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string,
		current_flag as integer,
		inserted_date as date,
		Lastupdate_date as date,
		PHASHkey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
